column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE CLEARED THE TOWN. OVER.
ROGER PAPA BEAR. GETTING THE CIVILIANS INTO EXTRACT POINT NOW. OVER.
ALPHA TO BRAVO. COME TO PICK US UP. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. LANDING ZONE IN SIGHT. PREPARE FOR INSERTION. OVER.
GOOD LUCK. WE WILL WAIT FOR YOUR RADIO CALL. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR EXTRACTION. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. COPY. GET THE CIVILIANS INTO EXTRACT LZ. OVER.
